name: Monirul Islam
aboutmeShortDesc: I have recently completed my graduation on Computer Science & Engineering from United International University. I am working as a freelance Full Stack Web Developer for past 1-2 years. I currently work with : React,js/Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, TypeScript, React-bootstrap etc. I also have real life working experience with JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Wordpress and many more.
freelanceShortDesc: I am also working as a freelance developer & designer in different freelance marketplaces like Fiverr & Upwork. While working as a freelancer, I have already worked with clients from 17 different countries all over the world.
